title: A Developer’s Guide to Building Scalable AI: Workflows vs Agents
content:
A practical guide to choosing between AI agents and workflows for production systems, covering the hidden costs, architectural trade-offs, and decision framework that can save you thousands in deployment mistakes. Includes real-world examples and a scoring system to determine which approach fits your specific use case.
The post A Developer’s Guide to Building Scalable AI: Workflows vs Agents appeared first on Towards Data Science.
author: Hailey Quach
